results.p: Erik.cassel was a co-founder, administrator and former VP of Engineering on Roblox. He was fairly active on the website but rarely visited any experiences.
an American video game developer based in San Mateo, California. Founded in 2004 by David Baszucki and Erik Cassel, the company is the developer of Roblox.
